faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about using YouTranscripts to generate YouTube video transcripts.
faq.tryButton: Try YouTube Transcript Generator for free

questions.a1: A YouTube transcript is the full text of everything spoken in a video, generated by YouTube's caption engine or a third-party tool. It lets you read, search and repurpose your video content as text.
questions.q2: How do I generate a YouTube transcript for any video?
questions.a2: Just paste your YouTube video URL into YouTranscripts (youtranscripts.com), click Generate Transcript, and get the complete text in seconds—no manual typing needed.
questions.q3: Is YouTube transcript generation free to use?
questions.a3: Yes—our YouTube transcript tool is 100% free. You can generate and download unlimited transcripts without signup, fees, or hidden charges.
questions.q4: How do I download YouTube video transcripts in TXT, DOC, PDF or SRT format?
questions.a4: After generating your transcript on youtranscripts.com, click Download and choose TXT, DOC, PDF or SRT. Your YouTube video transcript will save instantly in the format you need.
questions.q5: Can I translate YouTube transcripts to other languages?
questions.a5: Absolutely. Click Translate Transcript, select any target language, and our tool will deliver an accurate, translated YouTube transcript ready for reading or export.
questions.q6: Is there a limit to video length or number of transcripts I can generate?
questions.a6: Nope—there's no maximum video length or usage cap. YouTranscripts handles videos of any duration and lets you create as many transcripts as you like.
questions.q7: How accurate are the transcripts generated by YouTube video transcript generator by YouTranscripts?
questions.a7: Accuracy depends on audio quality and speaker clarity. On clear, well-recorded videos, you'll see ~90%+ accuracy. And you can always edit any remaining errors before exporting.

footer.disclaimer: Disclaimer: YouTranscripts is an independent service and is not associated or affiliated with YouTube or Google. Any brand names or logos displayed on this site are used for illustrative purposes only and do not imply endorsement or partnership.

about.title: About YouTranscripts
about.subtitle: The free YouTube transcript generator you can trust

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: YouTranscripts was created with a simple mission: to make YouTube content more accessible to everyone. We believe that the valuable information, education, and entertainment found in YouTube videos should be available in text format for those who prefer reading, need to reference specific parts, or require accessibility options.
mission.p2: Our free tool allows anyone to quickly generate transcripts from any YouTube video, translate them into multiple languages, and download them in various formats for different uses.
mission.p3: Founded in 2023, YouTranscripts has quickly become a trusted resource for students, researchers, content creators, and professionals worldwide who need quick and reliable access to YouTube video content in text form.

free.title: Free Transcript Generation
free.description: Generate transcripts from any YouTube video without paying a penny. No hidden fees, no subscriptions, just a simple and effective service.

languages.title: Multiple Languages
languages.description: Access transcripts in all available languages from the original video and translate them to over 125 languages.

download.title: Easy Download Options
download.description: Download transcripts in multiple formats including TXT, PDF, DOCX, SRT, and CSV for different use cases.

ai.title: AI Integration
ai.description: Easily summarize transcripts with ChatGPT and other AI tools with our one-click integration.

benefit.title: Who Can Benefit
benefit.students: Students and Researchers - Extract information from educational videos for notes and research
benefit.creators: Content Creators - Repurpose video content into blog posts, articles, and social media content
benefit.learners: Language Learners - Study content in your target language with side-by-side translations
benefit.professionals: Professionals - Extract key information from webinars and presentations
benefit.impaired: People with Hearing Impairments - Access video content in text format

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.p1: We are committed to keeping YouTranscripts free and accessible to everyone. We believe in the power of open access to information and will continue to improve our service based on user feedback.
commitment.p2: If you have any questions, suggestions, or feedback, please don't hesitate to
commitment.p3: We'd love to hear from you!

intro.description: we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you access and use our website, YouTranscripts.com (the "Site"). By using the Site, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

information.title: 1. Information We Collect
information.intro: We collect both personal and non-personal information to provide and improve our services. The information we may collect includes:

personal.title: a. Personal Information:
personal.registration: Registration Information: When you create an account on the Site, we collect personal information such as your name, email address, and any other details you provide during registration.
personal.payment: Payment Information: If you make a purchase, we collect payment information, such as credit card details or other payment method details, through our secure payment processor.
personal.communication: Communication Information: If you contact us through email or our support channels, we may collect your name, email address, and the contents of your communication for the purpose of responding to your inquiries.

nonPersonal.title: b. Non-Personal Information:
nonPersonal.log: Log Data: We collect information about how the Site is accessed and used, such as your IP address, browser type, browser version, the pages of our Site you visit, the time and date of your visit, and other diagnostic data.
nonPersonal.cookies: Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We use cookies to track activity on the Site and to store certain information. You can set your browser to refuse cookies or to alert you when cookies are being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of the Site.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use the information we collect in the following ways:

items.services: To Provide Services: To operate and maintain the Site and offer its features, including providing you with transcripts for YouTube videos, user support, and account management.
items.payments: To Process Payments: To process payments for services purchased through the Site, including subscription or one-time fees.
items.improve: To Improve the Site: To understand how our users interact with the Site, which helps us improve the user experience, troubleshoot issues, and enhance our services.
items.communicate: To Communicate with You: To send updates about your account, respond to inquiries, provide customer support, and send marketing communications (if you have opted into receiving such communications).
items.legal: To Comply with Legal Obligations: To comply with applicable laws and regulations, including enforcing our Terms of Service.

sharing.title: 3. Sharing of Your Information
sharing.intro: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties.
sharing.additional: However, we may share your information in the following circumstances:

items.providers: With Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party vendors, such as payment processors and cloud service providers, to help us operate the Site and provide our services. These third-party service providers are obligated to use your personal data solely for the purposes of providing their services to us.
items.legal: For Legal Reasons: We may disclose your personal information if required to do so by law, such as to comply with a subpoena, court order, or other legal process, or to protect our rights or the safety of others.
items.merger: In the Event of a Merger or Sale: If we are involved in a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your personal information may be transferred as part of that transaction.

retention.title: 4. Data Retention
retention.content: We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. If you delete your account, we will retain certain personal information as required by law or for legitimate business purposes.

security.title: 5. Security of Your Information
security.content: We take reasonable measures to protect the security of your personal information. However, please note that no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights and Choices
rights.intro: You have certain rights regarding your personal information:

items.access: Access: You can request access to the personal information we hold about you.
items.correction: Correction: You can update or correct any inaccurate or incomplete information we hold about you.
items.deletion: Deletion: You can request that we delete your personal information, subject to certain exceptions.
items.optOut: Opt-Out of Marketing Communications: You can opt out of receiving marketing emails from us by following the unsubscribe instructions in the email or by contacting us directly at contact@youtranscripts.com.
items.cookies: Cookies: You can manage cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect your ability to use certain features of the Site.

rights.exercise: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at

thirdParty.title: 7. Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: The Site may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not operated by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third-party sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.content: The Site is not intended for use by individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If we learn that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child under 18, we will take steps to delete that information.

international.title: 9. International Data Transfers
international.content: If you are accessing the Site from outside of India, please be aware that your information may be transferred to and processed in India. By using the Site, you consent to the transfer of your information to India and agree to comply with the laws of that jurisdiction.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, with the "Last Updated" date at the top. You are encouraged to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or the way we handle your personal information, please contact us at:

welcome.description: By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service, including our
welcome.disclaimer: If you do not agree to these Terms, you should not access or use the Site.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using YouTranscripts.com, you agree to these Terms of Service and any additional terms that apply to specific services provided by us. We may update these Terms from time to time, and such changes will be posted on this page. Your continued use of the Site after any changes are posted will constitute your acceptance of those changes.

description.title: 2. Description of Services
description.intro: YouTranscripts.com provides a tool to generate transcripts for YouTube videos
description.content: , enabling users to convert video audio into written text. These services may include but are not limited to:

services.search: Search and retrieval of transcript data
services.other: Other related services as offered by us from time to time

description.usage: You agree to use the services provided solely for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms.

eligibility.title: 3. Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use the Site. By using the Site, you represent that you are of legal age to form a binding contract and are not prohibited from using the services under applicable law.

account.title: 4. Account Registration
account.content: To access certain features of the Site, you may be required to register for an account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information during the registration process and to update it if there are any changes. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.

conduct.title: 5. User Conduct
conduct.intro: By using the Site, you agree not to:

items.illegal: Use the Site for any unlawful purpose or to promote illegal activities.
items.interfere: Interfere with or disrupt the services or servers connected to the Site.
items.impersonate: Impersonate any person or entity or falsely claim an affiliation with any person or entity.
items.infringe: Upload, post, or transmit content that infringes on the intellectual property rights of others, is offensive, abusive, or violates the rights of others.
items.damage: Engage in any behavior that could damage the reputation of YouTranscripts.com.

items.reproduce: Reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works of any part of the Site without prior written consent from YouTranscripts.com.
items.damage: Use the Site in any way that could disable, overburden, or damage the Site or interfere with other users' enjoyment of the Site.

payment.title: 7. Payment & Subscription
payment.intro: Certain features of the Site may require payment. By accessing paid features, you agree to the following:

items.charges: You are responsible for all charges and fees associated with your use of the paid services.
items.billing: Payments must be made through the available payment methods, and you agree to provide valid billing information.
items.renewal: Subscription services are subject to renewal unless canceled by you in accordance with the cancellation policy.

termination.title: 8. Termination and Suspension
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the Site or services at any time for any reason, including but not limited to a violation of these Terms. Upon termination, you must cease all use of the Site, and any unpaid fees will become due immediately.

intellectual.title: 9. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The content, features, and functionality of the Site are owned by YouTranscripts.com and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You agree not to copy, reproduce, or use any of the content from the Site without our express permission.

privacy.title: 10. Privacy Policy
privacy.content: Your use of the Site is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which can be found on our
privacy.additional: By using the Site, you consent to the collection and use of your data as described in the Privacy Policy.

disclaimers.title: 11. Disclaimers and Limitation of Liability
disclaimers.content: The services provided by YouTranscripts.com are offered
disclaimers.additional: We do not guarantee that the Site will be free of errors, interruptions, or defects. You agree that YouTranscripts.com shall not be liable for any damages arising from your use or inability to use the Site or its services, including but not limited to any loss of data or profits.

indemnification.title: 12. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold YouTranscripts.com, its affiliates, directors, employees, agents, and licensors harmless from any claims, damages, or losses arising out of your use of the Site or your violation of these Terms.

governing.title: 13. Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising under these Terms shall be resolved in the competent courts located in India.

modifications.title: 14. Modifications to the Terms of Service
modifications.content: We may revise and update these Terms at any time. All changes are effective immediately upon posting to the Site. You are encouraged to review these Terms periodically to stay informed about any updates.

contact.title: 15. Contact Information
contact.content: For any questions regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
